name: We March
description:
We March is a fast-paced spam click strategy game with horribly painful micromanagement and hundreds of identical colored squares on-screen at once.

Tips:

  • Don't be afraid to retreat. Retreating will let you regain manpower and better coordinate a future push.
  • Deploy riflemen behind shield units so they provide support and don't block shield units from accessing the frontline.
  • Clean up remaining pockets of enemies behind your frontline before advancing further. This may require you to stop some of your units.
  • Limit your use of the line deploy option to save money.

If you have any issues with the game write about them in the comments.

Known issues:

  • Downloaded game does not display properly when the screen height is different from 1080 pixels.
  • Web build explodes when launching game in full screen (probably related to first issue)
